scripts.docker-compose-stop: docker stop kpopit-db-1 && docker stop kpopit-api
scripts.docker-compose-start: docker start kpopit-db-1 && docker start kpopit-api
scripts.docker-restart-dev: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml stop && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d --build --no-deps
scripts.database-init-dev: docker exec -i kpopit-db-1 psql -U myuser -d mydb < database/kpopit-schema.sql
scripts.insert-idol-data-dev: docker exec -i kpopit-db-1 psql -U myuser -d mydb < database/kpopit-inserts.sql
scripts.open-database-dev: docker exec -it kpopit-db-1 psql -U myuser -d mydb
